elementSpec.desc: Contains the text as it is read (kri) when it differs from the written form (ktiv). Used in Hebrew text to represent the traditional pronunciation of words that are written differently in the text. Typically appears within a <choice> element alongside a <written> element.

Contains the text as it is written (ktiv) when it differs from the read form (kri). Used in Hebrew text to represent the written form of words that are pronounced differently. Typically appears within a <choice> element alongside a <read> element.
